Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Round

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Round
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Round extends Object implements Serializable
The Round class incorporates the management of the different planning and action phases. In particular, it provides the methods to manage the progress of the turns and the tracking of the current player.
Author:
Luca Bresciani

  • Constructor Details

    • Round

      public Round(ArrayList<Player> players)
      Constructor of the class. Given the Arraylist of the players that are playing it initializes the actionPhaseOrder list and the planningPhaseOrder list equal to the given parameter list. The constructor also initialize the boolean value isPlanning to true because each game will start from this phase.
      Parameters:
      players - is the list of player that are actually playing the game

    • getActionPhaseOrder

      public ArrayList<Player> getActionPhaseOrder()
      Gets the list of the players during the action phase calculated in accord to the game's rules.
      Returns:
      the list of the players during the action phase.

    • setRandomStartPlayer

      public void setRandomStartPlayer()
      This method sets the first random player and build the first planning phase order list

    • setPlanningPhaseOrder

      public void setPlanningPhaseOrder()
      This method set the planning phase list of players. At the beginning all element of the previous planning list are removed. Then the variable firstPlayer is initialized with the player that has played the card with the lower priority and finally the other players are added to the list simulating a clockwise lap as you would do in the physical game.

    • setActionPhaseOrder

      public void setActionPhaseOrder()
      This method set the action phase list of players. The list is sorted from the player which as played the lower priority card to the player which as played the highest priority card. The method also set the boolean variable isPlanning to false that indicates the beginning of the action phase.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the current player.
      Returns:
      the reference to the current player

    • getCurrentPlayerIndex

      public int getCurrentPlayerIndex()
      Private method that calculate the currentTurn player index inside the planning phase list or inside the action phase list depending on which phase the game is.
      Returns:
      the index of the currentTurn player inside the planningPhaseOrder list or actionPhaseOrder list

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      This method modify the current player and indicates the start of a new turn.

    • nextRound

      public void nextRound()
      This method increase the round number and set the boolean value isPlanning to true which indicates the beginning of a new planning phase.

    • setIsEnding

      public void setIsEnding(boolean isEnding)

    • setCurrentTurn

      public void setCurrentTurn(Player player)

    • isRoundEnding

      public boolean isRoundEnding()
      Returns:
      true if the last player is playing in the action phase, false otherwise

    • isPlanning

      public boolean isPlanning()
      Returns:
      true if the current turn is a planning turn, false is the current turn is an action turn

      public void setGame(Game game)
